00040 using namespace Network;

00043 using RDK2::RNetObjects::RYellowPages;

00046 UdpManager::UdpManager(Repository* repository) : repository(repository), exiting(false),
00047     udpSocket()
00048 { }
00049 
00050 bool UdpManager::init()
00051 {
00052     receiverSession = repository->createSession("udpReceiver", "UDP receiver session", "/");
00053     senderSession = repository->createSession("udpSender", "UDP sender session", "/");
00054 
00055     Session* session = repository->createSession("udpPortBinder",
00056         "Session for UDP port binding", "/");
00057 
00058     bool done = false;
00059     while (!done) {
00060         try {
00061             session->start();
00062 
00063             InetAddress addrToBind;
00064 
00065             session->lock(PROPERTY_YELLOWPAGES, WHERE("Getting my address"));
00066             RYellowPages* yp = session->getObjectAsL<RYellowPages>(PROPERTY_YELLOWPAGES);
00067             if (yp->getSocketAddress(Network::UDP_IP, session->getRepositoryName(), addrToBind)) {
00068                 session->setIntB(PROPERTY_UDP_PORT, addrToBind.getPort());
00069             }
00070             else {
00071                 RDK_ERROR_PRINTF("I cannot find my address in the yellow pages");
00072             }
00073             session->unlock(PROPERTY_YELLOWPAGES);
00074             udpSocket.bind(addrToBind);
00075             RDK_INFO_PRINTF("UDP socket bound to port %d", addrToBind.getPort());
00076 
00077             done = true;
00078             session->end();
00079         }
00080         catch (Network::NetException& netexc) {
00081             session->terminate();
00082             RDK_ERROR_STREAM("Unable to bind UDP socket (" << netexc.fullwhat() << ", retry in 4s)");
00083             sleep(4);
00084         }
00085         catch (const SessionException& e) {
00086             session->terminate();
00087             delete session;
00088             RDK_ERROR_PRINTF("Error in getting yellow pages (%s)", e.what());
00089             return false;
00090         }
00091     }
00092     delete session;
00093     return true;
00094 }
00095 
00096 bool UdpManager::start()
00097 {
00098     if (!createThread(&receiverThreadId, (void*(*)(void*))receiverThreadFn,
00099             this, "UDP receiver thread")) return false;
00100     if (!createThread(&senderThreadId, (void*(*)(void*))senderThreadFn,
00101             this, "UDP sender thread")) return false;
00102     return true;
00103 }
00104 
00105 void UdpManager::receiver() {
00106 #ifdef UDPMANAGER_DEBUG_RECEIVER
00107     #warning UDPMANAGER_DEBUG_RECEIVER enabled ( A lot of debug, not good for everyday job )
00108     #define LDOUT(a) { RDK_DEBUG_STREAM("receiver: "<<a) }
00109 #else
00110     #define LDOUT(a)
00111 #endif
00112     RDK_INFO_PRINTF("UDP receiver started");
00113 
00114     Session* session = receiverSession;     // just a shortcut
00115 
00116     BinaryReader br;
00117 
00118     while (!exiting) {
00119         string message_buffer;
00120         Network::InetAddress from;
00121         int nbytes = 0;
00122         LDOUT("Waiting for incoming messages");
00123         LDOUT("Socket is bound to " << udpSocket.getAddress().getIPAddress().c_str() << ", port "
00124             << udpSocket.getAddress().getPort());
00125 
00126         try { nbytes = udpSocket.recv(message_buffer, from); }
00127         catch (const NetException& e) {
00128             RDK_ERROR_STREAM("Failure in receiving: " << e.fullwhat());
00129         }
00130 
00131         RNetMessage* message = 0;
00132         if (nbytes) {
00133             try { message = dynamic_cast<RNetMessage*>(br.deserialize(message_buffer)); }
00134             catch (const ReadingException& e) {
00135                 RDK_ERROR_PRINTF("Failure in deserializing: %s", e.what());
00136             }
00137         }
00138 
00139         if (message) {
00140             SESSION_TRY_START(session)
00141                 if (message->getSender() == session->getRepositoryName()) {
00142                     RDK_ERROR_PRINTF("Received a message from myself via socket (?!?)")
00143                 }
00144                 LDOUT("Inserting a message in the inbox.")
00145                 session->queuePush(PROPERTY_INBOX, message);
00146                 LDOUT("Inserted a message in the inbox")
00147             SESSION_END_CATCH_TERMINATE(session)
00148         }
00149     }
00150     delete session;
00151 #undef LDOUT
00152 }
00153 
00154 void UdpManager::sender() {
00155 #ifdef UDPMANAGER_DEBUG_SENDER
00156     #warning UDPMANAGER_DEBUG_SENDER enabled ( A lot of debug, not good for everyday job )
00157     #define LDOUT(a) { RDK_DEBUG_STREAM("sender: "a) }
00158 #else
00159     #define LDOUT(a)
00160 #endif
00161     RDK_INFO_PRINTF("UDP sender started");
00162 
00163     Session* session = senderSession;   // just a shortcut
00164 
00165     SESSION_TRY_START(session)
00166     session->queueSubscribe(PROPERTY_OUTBOX);
00167     session->queueSetInterests(PROPERTY_OUTBOX, new UdpSenderInterests);
00168     session->listen(PROPERTY_OUTBOX);
00169     SESSION_END_CATCH_TERMINATE(session)
00170 
00171     BinaryWriter bw(true);
00172 
00173     while (session->wait(), !exiting) {
00174         SESSION_TRY_START(session)
00175             vector<const RDK2::Object*> toSend = session->queueFreeze(PROPERTY_OUTBOX);
00176             LDOUT("Outbox contains " << toSend.size() << " messages");
00177             for (vector<const RDK2::Object*>::iterator it = toSend.begin(); it != toSend.end(); ++it) {
00178                 LDOUT("Message: " << (*it)->getStringForVisualization().c_str());
00179                 const RNetMessage* msg = dynamic_cast<const RNetMessage*>(*it);
00180                 if (!msg) {
00181                     RDK_ERROR_PRINTF("What the hell have you put in the outbox? (class: %s)",
00182                         (*it)->getClassName().c_str());
00183                 }
00184                 else {
00185                     LDOUT("Object class is '" << msg->getPayload()->getClassName().c_str() << "'");
00186                     try {
00187                         string outData = bw.serialize(true, msg);
00188                         //RDK_DEBUG_PRINTF("Size: %u", outData.size());
00189                         if (outData.size() > UDP_MESSAGE_MAXSIZE) {
00190                             RDK_ERROR_PRINTF("Error during message serialization (message too large: "
00191                                 "size: %d, max: %d)", outData.size(), UDP_MESSAGE_MAXSIZE);
00192                         }
00193                         else {
00194                             LDOUT("Sending " << outData.size() << " bytes");
00195                             istringstream addressees(msg->getAddressees());
00196                             string address;
00197 
00198                             session->lock(PROPERTY_YELLOWPAGES, WHERE("Sending messages"));
00199                             RYellowPages* yp =
00200                                 session->getObjectAsL<RYellowPages>(PROPERTY_YELLOWPAGES);
00201 
00202                             while (addressees >> address && ! exiting) {
00203                                 if (address == repository->getRepositoryName()) {
00204                                     LDOUT("Sending a message to myself");
00205                                     session->queuePush(PROPERTY_INBOX, msg->clone());
00206                                 }
00207                                 else {
00208                                     InetAddress destination;
00209                                     if (yp->getSocketAddress(Network::UDP_IP,
00210                                     address, destination)) {
00211                                         try {
00212                                             while (!udpSocket.send(outData,
00213                                             destination) && !exiting) {
00214                                                 RDK_ERROR_STREAM("Error "
00215                                                 "on socket UDP");
00216                                                 udpSocket.rebind();
00217                                             }
00218                                             LDOUT("Message sent to " << address);
00219                                         }
00220                                         catch (Network::NetException& netexc) {
00221                                             RDK_ERROR_STREAM("Failure in sending: " <<
00222                                             netexc.fullwhat());
00223                                         }
00224                                     }
00225                                 }
00226                             }
00227                             session->unlock(PROPERTY_YELLOWPAGES);
00228                         }
00229                     }
00230                     catch (const WritingException& e) {
00231                         RDK_ERROR_PRINTF("Error during message serialization (%s)", e.what());
00232                     }
00233                 }
00234             }
00235         SESSION_END_CATCH_TERMINATE(session)
00236     }
00237 
00238     SESSION_TRY_START(session)
00239     session->queueUnsubscribe(PROPERTY_OUTBOX);
00240     SESSION_END_CATCH_TERMINATE(session)
00241 
00242     delete session;
00243 #undef LDOUT
00244 }
00245 
00246 UdpManager::~UdpManager()
00247 {
00248     exiting = true;
00249     // the receiver thread is waiting on the socket, not on the session
00250     udpSocket.shutdown(UDPSocket::ALL);
00251     // the sender thread is waiting on the session
00252     senderSession->wakeUp();
00253     // joining threads, they also delete their sessions when exiting from the loop
00254     pthread_join(receiverThreadId, 0);
00255     pthread_join(senderThreadId, 0);
00256     RDK_INFO_PRINTF("UDP manager closed");
00257 }
